{"id":1057533178,"question_id":3055,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1695523611,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1057533178/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Odd Binary Number","memory":"42.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String maximumOddBinaryNumber(String s) {\n        char[] arr = s.toCharArray();\n        \n        int cnt= 0 ;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<arr.length; i++){\n            if(arr[i]=='1')\n                cnt++;\n        }\n        \n        \n        arr[arr.length-1]='1';\n        cnt--; \n        \n        int idx = 0;\n        while(cnt-->0){\n          arr[idx++]='1';\n            \n        }\n        \n       while(idx<arr.length-1){\n           arr[idx++]='0';\n       }\n        \n        return new String(arr);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-odd-binary-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
